testcase.classname: Get the details of an environment with tiers in a tenant : Get the details of an environment with several tiers with products and networks
testcase.name: Given the paas manager is up and properly configured

testcase.classname: Get the details of an environment with tiers in a tenant : Get the details of an environment with several tiers with products and networks
testcase.name: When I request the details of the environment with name "nameqa"

testcase.classname: Get the details of an environment with tiers in a tenant : Get the details of an environment with several tiers with products and networks
testcase.name: Then I receive an "OK" response with the previous tiers and data:

failure.message: The data for tier tiernameqa1 does not match the expected one. Received: <tierDtos><minimumNumberInstances>1</minimumNumberInstances><initialNumberInstances>1</initialNumberInstances><maximumNumberInstances>1</maximumNumberInstances><name>tiernameqa1</name><image>e6c5b19e-f655-4da8-86ea-6dd05be673ef</image><flavour>2</flavour><keypair>pge354_keypair</keypair><floatingip>false</floatingip><region>RegionOne</region><productReleaseDtos><productName>git</productName><version>1.7</version></productReleaseDtos></tierDtos>. Expected: <tierDtos><minimumNumberInstances>1</minimumNumberInstances><initialNumberInstances>1</initialNumberInstances><maximumNumberInstances>1</maximumNumberInstances><name>tiernameqa1</name><image>e6c5b19e-f655-4da8-86ea-6dd05be673ef</image><flavour>2</flavour><keypair>pge354_keypair</keypair><floatingip>false</floatingip><region>RegionOne</region><productReleaseDtos><productName>git</productName><version>1.7</version></productReleaseDtos><networkDto><networkName>netqa1</networkName></networkDto></tierDtos>.

testcase.failure: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/vagrant/fiware-stuff/venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/lettuce/core.py", line 144, in __call__ ret = self.function(self.step, *args, **kw) File "/home/vagrant/workspace/fiware-paas/test/acceptance/integration/environments/get_environment_details/steps.py", line 70, in i_receive_a_response_of_type_with_the_previous_tiers_and_data world.tiers) File "/home/vagrant/workspace/fiware-paas/test/acceptance/tools/environment_request.py", line 415, in check_get_environment_response % (received_tier.name, tostring(received_tier.to_tier_xml()), tostring(expected_tier.to_tier_xml())) AssertionError: The data for tier tiernameqa1 does not match the expected one.
